title: Slay Belle Katarina Tweaks.
body:
Hello, as a Katarina main I am a bit disappointed in one of Katarina's skins, Slay Belle Katarina.
Now the skin itelf is pretty good; new look for Kat, slight audio tweaks and a new recall animation. Pretty good.
But the player model skin itself lacks color. 
If you look at the hair, it has a grey scale type of theme with the blonde. I think her hair should be a bright, vibrant blonde.
The red and white suit also lackss in color, if you look at it the red seems to look as if it is lacking in color, which I think should be a real eye-popping red that is very luminous. 
And the white areas seem to be almost grey, which does not look appealing.
If these tweaks could be put onto Katarina's Christmas skin that would be good to see, as it is a skin none the less and should look appealing to purchase and look as good as the splash art says.

(I would of put images onto this discussion but I do not know how xD )
